name: 枪神细胞 Gunnery Cell
description:
Game Category

  • A solid arena shooting game, and I guarantee that only you have a gun, the enemy does not!

Game Features

  • Fast and easy to pick up, the average game time is no more than 20 minutes, you can enter the arena at any time to kill enemies!
  • Pure barrage shooting experience, there are no special rules to limit you, your goal is only one, that is, use the weapons in your hand to send the enemies rolling back to hell!
  • A variety of distinctive weapons, try a revolver, shotgun, assault rifle, howitzer, or even a book!
  • Rogue-like enhanced promotion mechanism, as you survive longer in the arena, you will become more and more powerful until you become a gun God!
